articles.author: Laura Millan, Macarena Munoz Montijano, Thomas Gualtieri, Daniel Basteiro
articles.title: Spain and Portugal Hit by Widespread Power Blackouts - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Most of Spain and all of Portugal were hit by a major blackout that impacted public transport, airports and phone service, leaving authorities scrambling to find the causes for one of the worst outages in Europe in years.
